accepted: 您的取款请求已被接受。
processed: 将在一个工作日内处理。
confirmation: 提款链接已发送到您的电子邮件，此提款链接将在30分钟后失效。
unexpectedError: 意外错误。请联系技术支持。
confirm: 我确认提供的地址与所选货币对应
transactionFeeDescription: The network applies a transaction fee, which varies based on blockchain usage. RollerCoin does not charge any transaction fees.
oncePerDay: 每天处理一次提款交易
withdrawDelay: Withdrawal time depends on the blockchain, and may take up to 7-10 business days.
tokenTitle: 您的钱包 | RollerCoin.com | 代币销售
withdrawalTitle: 您的钱包 | RollerCoin.com | 提现
pleaseNoteThat: 请注意! 目前 {{currency}} 的菲律宾平时的要高

transactions.sorry: 对不起，你还没有任何交易

tokens.kyc: 请填写这张简短的KYC表格
tokens.verification: 不需要身份或地址验证。是的，我们非常信任您：）
tokens.name: 名字
tokens.onlyEnglish: 只允许使用英文字母和数字

depositPage.minDepositText: Due to high transaction fees in {{network}} network, we have temporary limited the minimum {{baseCurrency}} deposit amount to {{value}} {{baseCurrency}}. Please, make sure you don’t send less than this amount as it won’t be deposited to your account and it can’t be refunded. Thank you!

warning.wrapped: in RollerCoin. We use {{currency}} currency for technical reasons.

checkWithdraw.pleaseCheck: Please double-check the details of your withdrawal and then confirm it

infoHints.titleInfoTooltipText: Here you can view the list of available tokens and your balance for each of them.
infoHints.withdrawInfoTooltipMessage: Here you can view your deposit address and withdraw your crypto.
